text:
MANU CHANDARIA: I think
that a moral set of values

are something which
can change people.

I can be very sweet and talk
about so many other things.

But to me, some of the basic
facts in life has to be seen,

to be understood,
and to be acceptable.

And this is sometimes
very difficult.

But because of the
status that you reach,

They will listen because they
know that I have less interest.

If I don't like Guinea,
I'll be in Geneva.

If I don't like Geneva,
I could be in London.

But they know that I'm
sitting there to turn

And basically because
of that, I think

that we have been able
to make lots of changes

I don't think that you can
make changes by pushing hard.
